name: Dance
additionalGcseEquivalencies: We ask candidates to use third party providers to access equivalency tests.
aboutCourse: Trainees learn on the job in a supportive environment with a mentor throughout their training.  The majority of the training takes place on the 2 school placements and trainees attend training days at Equalitas.  Trainees are assessed through an ongoing system of internal and external evaluation which leads to a final assessment process.  Trainees will be provided with a timetable within their subject area and work across all the Key Stages.
interviewProcess: Trainees are interviewed by the individual schools that are looking to train future teachers.  Trainees are asked to teach a micro lesson, complete literacy and numeracy tests.
howSchoolPlacementsWork: Secondary trainees spend the majority of their time in 1 base school.  They spend a 6 week block in a comparative school and complete a shorter placement in a primary school.  Primary trainees complete a second placement of 1 month in a different Key Stage or setting and complete a short placement in a secondary school in Key Stage 3.
personalQualities: Trainees ideally need some experience of life in a school.
